title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library that wraps the Ollama REST API for chatting, pulling and managing models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with a local Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that adds Ollama models as LLM and chat components for RAG, agents, etc.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama-WebUI) for chatting, model management, RAG, multimodal and admin controls.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library providing fluent builders and POJO mapping for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama from Ruby/Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli (go-llama)
summary: Community Go CLI that wraps Ollama endpoints with interactive chat, model search and shell completion.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed request/response models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async HTTP bindings and typed structs for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-made Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama, WebUI, Postgres vector store and optional GPU flags.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama and WebUI on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Minimal Python streamlit app showing RAG over PDFs using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that lets servers query local Ollama models via slash commands with per-user quotas.

title: ollama-npm (unofficial wrapper)
summary: Community npm package exposing TypeScript helpers to download, list and chat with Ollama models.

title: ollama-py on PyPI
summary: Official PyPI package for the Ollama Python client (same repo as ollama-python).

title: ollama-reddit community discussion
summary: Active thread where users share their favorite Ollama tools, wrappers and automations.

title: ollama-hackernews launch recap
summary: Hacker News discussion summarizing launch feedback, performance notes and ecosystem growth.
